availableModels: Based on the code I've reviewed, here are the **available models** in your Project Genie application:
- **`gpt-5-nano`** - Most cost-efficient ($0.025 input / $0.20 output per 1M tokens)
- **`gpt-5-mini`** - Balanced cost/performance ($0.25 input / $2.00 output per 1M tokens) - **FORCED DEFAULT**
- **`gpt-5`** - Premium model ($0.50 input / $4.00 output per 1M tokens)
- **`gpt-4.1-nano`** - Structured data dev ($0.075 input / $0.30 output per 1M tokens)
- **`gpt-4.1-mini`** - Structured data production ($0.15 input / $0.60 output per 1M tokens)
- Structured documents with complex schemas (PID, Business Case)
- JSON generation with guaranteed schema adherence
- API responses requiring strict format validation
The system is currently configured to use **gpt-5-mini** by default for optimal cost/performance balance.
